lemma splitTree_correctE: assumes mono: "\<forall>a b. p a \<longrightarrow> p (a + b)" assumes init_ff: "\<not> p i" assumes sum_tt: "p (i + annot s)" obtains l e a r where "(splitTree p i s) = (l, (e,a), r)" and "(toList s) = (toList l) @ (e,a) # (toList r)" and "\<not> p (i + annot l)" and "p (i + annot l + a)"
